c++ -fPIC -O0  -shared -Wl,-soname,libnet.so -o ../../../lib/libnet.so CMakeFiles/net.dir/Acceptor.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/Buffer.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/Channel.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/Connector.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/EventLoop.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/EventLoopThread.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/EventLoopThreadPool.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/InetAddress.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/Poller.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/poller/DefaultPoller.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/poller/EPollPoller.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/poller/PollPoller.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/Socket.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/SocketsOps.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/TcpClient.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/TcpConnection.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/TcpServer.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/Timer.cc.o CMakeFiles/net.dir/TimerQueue.cc.o  -Wl,-rpath,/root/git/lzh_project/build/lib: ../../../lib/libbase.so -lpthread -lrt
